meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bill Burns Megan Selva Todd Giese Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7268.

td.p: Bill Burns, a management consultant from Carrollton, Texas
Megan Selva, a content manager from Woodbridge, Virginia
Todd Giese, a hotel front desk manager from New Orleans, Louisiana (whose 1-day cash winnings total $31,601)

tr.td: HIGHWAYS & BYWAYS
WORD ORIGINS
TASTY ADS & JINGLES
HISTORIC DOCUMENTS
DEALER'S CHOICE
"LITTLE" MOVIES

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_4', 'clue_J_2_4_stuck', '(Megan: What is a Plutarch?)
(Alex: No.)
(Megan: or the [*].)
(Alex: No. Bill?)
(Bill: What is a [*]?)
(Alex: Yes. Megan, you understand that I ruled against you, so you could not then change your response. You helped Bill out, but I have a feeling he knew [*].)

plutocrat

MeganBill
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Todd
Megan
Bill
SENSORY LIT
2 FIRST NAMES?
INVENTION & INNOVATION
VIDEO GAMES
CHURCHES & CATHEDRALS
AFTER IMAGE
(Alex: Each correct response will be a word that begins with "I-M", but comes after the word "image" in the dictionary.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Famous for non sequiturs like, "Baseball is 90% mental, the other half is physical.")
...
(Alex: [*], the immortal.)
BillWho is Yogi Berra?
$1,500
MeganWho is ?
$10,399
ToddWho is Yogi Berra?
$4,201
Yogi Berra')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'On his death in 2015, his New York Times obit said he "built his stardom 90 percent on skill and half on wit"')

tr.td: OBITUARIES
(Alex: Is this a gloomy subject, or what?)
On his death in 2015, his New York Times obit said he "built his stardom 90 percent on skill and half on wit"
Todd
Megan
Bill
2-day champion: $52,402
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
Todd
Megan
Bill

21 R
(including 2 DDs),
5 W
(including 1 DD)

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
